name: Students Leads

description: Students Leads is a database management
overview:
Students Leads is a database management and lead generation company that provides opt-in student database to various education industries. Solution provider for those industries have market or product segment for Indian Students & Fresher only.

Student’s database is the identification of a student or entity that has interest to purchase a product or service. This step represents the first stage of an education sales process.

There are two main types of marketing students databases 1) Consumer students databases, and 2) business students databases. Consumer students databases are primarily geared towards companies that sell to students, often abbreviated as B2C or BtoC. Business marketing students databases are often much more advanced in the information that they can provide.

The “students database” is usually name, address, and email details from internal sales or delivery systems, through marketing survey or BTL (Below the line) activity, which has captured that information from its students.
